author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-2500: add DirectIOLinuxDirectory, a Linux-only (requires compiling .cpp JNI code per platform) which bypasses the buffer cache so segment merging does not evict cached files

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-2142: also in .getStrings, stop loading if we hit too many terms

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-2142: if FieldsCache.getStrings/Index is mis-used (more than 1 term per doc), stop loading once number of terms > number of docs
